Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nosey \nosey\ adj. Offensively or intrusively curious; prying; nosy; as, a nosy neighbor.
Syn: inquisitorial, nosy, prying, snoopy. [WordNet 1.5]

nosey adj : offensively curious or inquisitive; "curious about the neighbor's doings"; "he flipped through my letters in his nosy way"; "prying eyes"; "the snoopy neighbor watched us all day" [syn: {nosy}, {prying}, {snoopy}]
